oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Students inspect an Eastern Airlines plane at Nashville’s Airport, 1954 May
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: students and teachers on a field trip to inspect an Eastern Airlines plane at the Nashville Airport, circa May 1954. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Metropolitan Nashville Airport Authority--History--Sources; Eastern Air Lines
